page.title: 13BAMFORD PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: THE COUNCIL MEETS ONCE A MONTH AND VARIOUS TOPICS ARE DISCUSSED CONCERNING BAMFORD. A NEW BRIDGE WAS BUILT OVER PART OF THE RIVER DERWENT NEAR CARBOLITE MILL.THE 11th.SIGNALS REGIMENT FROM CATTERICK CAMP CARRIED OUT THE WORK. THREE NEW STREET LIGHTS WERE ORDERED AT A COST OF Â£1100, TO BE ERECTED AT{JOAN LANE}, {FIDDLERS WELL} AND{THE HOLLOW.} OTHER DEVELOPMENTS THIS YEAR HAVE INCLUDED THE RE-ERECTION OF THE ANCIENT {TOLL GATE}POSTS NEAR SICKLEHOLM BUS TURNAROUND A NEW CAR PARK HAS BEEN BUILT AT { {LADYBOWER DAM}TO MAKE VISITORS PARKING SAFER AND EASIER. SAILING IS STILL PERMITTED ALTHOUGH RESTRICTIONS HAVE BEEN PLACED ON {RASPBERRY BAY} .ALTHOUGH THE SCHOOL CROSSING REMAINS NEAR THE GREEN A SET OF FLASHING......
